statements: SELECT * FROM public_transport;
SELECT route_name, departure_time FROM public_transport WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM public_transport ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT route_name, arrival_time FROM public_transport WHERE schedule_id > 3;
SELECT schedule_id, route_name, arrival_time FROM public_transport ORDER BY schedule_id ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM public_transport WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, departure_time FROM public_transport WHERE arrival_time > '12:00:00' ORDER BY route_name;
SELECT * FROM public_transport WHERE schedule_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM public_transport WHERE route_name LIKE '%Express%' ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, route_name FROM public_transport WHERE departure_time < '09:00:00' AND arrival_time > '17:00:00';
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT route_name, starting_point, destination FROM routes WHERE frequency > 5;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE day_of_week IN ('Monday', 'Wednesday', 'Friday');
SELECT route_id, COUNT(schedule_id) AS num_schedules FROM schedules GROUP BY route_id;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE route_id = 1 ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, day_of_week, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' AND departure_time >= '09:00:00';
SELECT route_name, starting_point, destination, frequency FROM routes WHERE frequency > 5 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, day_of_week, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '12:00:00' AND '18:00:00' AND arrival_time < '15:00:00';

SELECT schedule_id, day_of_week, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules INNER JOIN routes ON schedules.route_id = routes.route_id WHERE routes.starting_point = 'New York' ORDER BY arrival_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transportation_routes;
SELECT stop_name, stop_location, stop_zone FROM public_transportation_stops ORDER BY stop_zone DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE route_type = 'Bus';
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_schedule WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01 08:00:00';
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE route_type = 'Bus' ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT stop_name, stop_location, stop_zone FROM public_transportation_stops WHERE stop_zone = 1 ORDER BY stop_name DESC;
SELECT s.*, r.route_name FROM public_transportation_schedule s JOIN public_transportation_routes r ON s.route_id = r.route_id WHERE s.departure_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY s.departure_time ASC;

SELECT r.route_name, s.departure_time, s.arrival_time FROM public_transportation_schedule s JOIN public_transportation_routes r ON s.route_id = r.route_id WHERE r.route_type = 'Train' AND s.stop_id IN (SELECT stop_id FROM public_transportation_stops WHERE stop_zone = 2) ORDER BY s.departure_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, capacity FROM vehicles WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location FROM routes WHERE end_location='City Center';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location LIKE '%Station%';
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id=schedules.route_id;

SELECT vehicles.vehicle_name, vehicles.capacity, routes.route_name, schedules.departure_time FROM vehicles JOIN schedules ON vehicles.vehicle_id=schedules.route_id JOIN routes ON schedules.route_id=routes.route_id WHERE schedules.departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE route_id = 2;
SELECT route_id, stop_id, arrival_time FROM connections WHERE arrival_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT stop_name, stop_location FROM stops WHERE stop_location LIKE '%Station%';
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE route_id = 1 AND departure_time > NOW()
SELECT route_name, route_description FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC
SELECT stop_name, stop_location FROM stops WHERE stop_id = 3 OR stop_id = 5
SELECT * FROM connections JOIN stops ON connections.stop_id = stops.stop_id WHERE arrival_time < '2022-01-01'
SELECT vehicle_type, capacity FROM vehicles WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY capacity DESC
